project_description: A Flutter luxury chauffeur service app featuring an elegant onboarding flow with sliding transitions, authentication options, and user registration process using the Stacked architecture.
architecture_overview: The application follows the Stacked architecture with separate folders for app setup, features (onboarding, authentication), UI components, and utilities. It uses Stacked for state management, routing, and dependency injection, with additional services for authentication and validation.

files.name: lib/app/app.dart
files.description: Defines the app structure using StackedApp annotation for routes, dependencies, and services. Includes all onboarding routes and authentication services.

files.name: lib/features/onboarding/welcome/welcome_view.dart
files.description: The initial welcome page displaying Gyde branding and introductory content

files.name: lib/services/auth_service.dart
files.description: Handles authentication logic including phone and email verification

dependencies.name: stacked
dependencies.purpose: Stacked architecture for state management and routing

dependencies.name: page_transition
dependencies.purpose: Sliding page transitions for onboarding flow

sequence_diagram:
@startuml
actor User
participant WelcomeView
participant AuthOptionsView
participant PhoneInputView
participant VerificationView
participant EmailCollectionView
participant WelcomeConfirmationView
participant TermsView
participant AuthService

User -> WelcomeView: Start
WelcomeView -> AuthOptionsView: Choose auth method
AuthOptionsView -> PhoneInputView: Select phone
PhoneInputView -> AuthService: Verify phone
AuthService -> VerificationView: Send code
VerificationView -> EmailCollectionView: Verify success
EmailCollectionView -> WelcomeConfirmationView: Submit email
WelcomeConfirmationView -> TermsView: Continue
TermsView -> User: Complete onboarding
@enduml
state_management_flow: State is managed using the Stacked architecture with ViewModels for each onboarding page. The AuthService maintains authentication state, while ViewModels handle form validation and user input state. Navigation state is managed through the Stacked Router.
navigation_flow: The app starts with WelcomeView, progressing through the onboarding flow with sliding transitions. Each view has a 'Next' or 'Continue' button that triggers navigation to the next page. The flow includes welcome, authentication options, phone input, verification, email collection, welcome confirmation, and terms pages.
